type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying, haste
[i]Raijinaxe[/i] – Whenever Ryoma, Hoshidan Dragoon attacks, put a +1/+1 counter onto him and up to one other target creature that is attacking the same player.
[i]Clearer Skies – [/i]Creatures your opponents control enter tapped.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Ryoma attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, attacking creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
